CustomField.description: Maximum number of LLM calls allowed per transaction for multi-turn optimization. When a sync tool doesn't perform DML or callouts, the framework can call the LLM again in the same transaction instead of queueing a follow-up job. This reduces queueable usage and improves response latency. Set to 1 to disable multi-LLM optimization.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Max LLM calls per transaction. Set to 1 to disable multi-LLM optimization. Default is 2, allowing one additional LLM call when the first tool is safe.
CustomField.label: Max LLM Calls Per Transaction
